page.title: 09KING ARTHUR'S STONE
page.content: ON TOP OF THE MOORLAND WHICH IS KNOWN AS CEFN BRYN,IS A NEOLITHIC CHAMBERBURIAL TOMB DATED APPROX 2500 BC.THIS HAS BEEN GIVEN THE NAME KING ARTHUR'S STONE.THE CAPSTONE,A GLACIAL BOULDER WEIGHS 24 TONS AND IS SURROUNDED BY A NUMBER OF SMALLER STONES.THE NAME COMES FROM THE LEGEND OF KING ARTHUR WHO IS SAID TO HAVE FLUNG A STONE FROM HIS SHOE WHEN HE WAS ACROSS THE ESTUARY IN DYFED.THE STONE IS ALSO SAID TO VISIT THE SEA FOR A DRINK ON CERTAIN NIGHTS.THE STONE IS POSSIBLY THE "MAEN CETI";ONE OF THE WONDERS OF ANCIENT BRITON.
